rules: Rule1: Provided that person alpha develops device alpha, device alpha collects personal data.
Rule2: Either agency gamma finds a minor violation or agency gamma finds a major violation.
Rule3: Assuming agency gamma finds a major violation, then if agency gamma investigates company beta, company beta submits a compliance report.
Rule4: If agency gamma has legal authority, then, given that agency gamma finds a minor violation, if agency gamma investigates company beta, company beta submits a compliance report.
Rule5: Company beta appeals or device alpha complies with the GDPR.
Rule6: If company beta settles out of court, then company beta does not pay the fine.
Rule7: Company beta settles out of court, or company beta negotiates a reduction.
Rule8: Should company beta negotiate a reduction, then company beta does not pay the fine.
Rule9: In the event that device alpha processes personal data, device alpha complies with the GDPR.
Rule10: When company beta receives a sanction, company beta receives a warning.

Rule11: If the GDPR mandates corrective action, then, assuming that it is not the case that if device alpha does not comply with the GDPR, company beta receives a sanction, company beta reforms its practices.
Rule12: Provided that company beta adopts encryption, company beta implements new protocols.
Rule13: If device alpha collects personal data, then device alpha stores personal data.
Rule14: Provided that company beta fears bankruptcy, then if company beta considers bankruptcy, either company beta declares bankruptcy or company beta does not pay the fine.
Rule15: Whenever company beta regrets the violation, company beta accepts the penalty.
Rule16: If company beta denies wrongdoing, then company beta does not appeal.
Rule17: Either CEO delta admits fault or CEO delta blames CTO epsilon.
Rule18: Under the condition that CEO delta blames CTO epsilon, company beta denies wrongdoing.
Rule19: If board zeta pressures CEO delta, then if CEO delta admits fault, company beta regrets the violation.
Rule20: Provided that device alpha stores personal data, device alpha processes personal data.
Rule21: Should company beta be fined, then device alpha complies with the GDPR.
Rule22: Assuming agency gamma issues a penalty notice, then if company beta violates the GDPR, company beta is fined.
Rule23: If company beta submits a compliance report, then agency gamma issues a penalty notice.

Rule24: If it is not the case that company beta hires a DPO or, if it is not the case that if it is not the case that company beta accepts the penalty or does not appeal, then company beta contests the penalty, leads to company beta not losing the appeal, then company beta adopts encryption, then company beta faces a lawsuit.

Rule25: If it is not the case that company beta hires a DPO or, if it is not the case that if it is not the case that company beta accepts the penalty or does not appeal, then company beta contests the penalty, leads to company beta not losing the appeal, then company beta adopts encryption, then it is not the case that company beta faces a lawsuit.
Rule26: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that company beta accepts the penalty or does not appeal, then company beta contests the penalty, then company beta loses the appeal.

Rule27: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that company beta accepts the penalty or does not appeal, then company beta contests the penalty, leads to company beta not losing the appeal, then company beta pays the fine.
Rule28: Should device alpha not comply with the GDPR, then it is not the case that company beta receives a warning.
facts: Fact1: Person alpha develops device alpha.
Fact2: Agency gamma has legal authority.
Fact3: The GDPR mandates corrective action.
Fact6: Board zeta pressures CEO delta.
Fact7: Company beta violates the GDPR.
Fact8: Agency gamma investigates company beta.
Fact9: Company beta does not accept the penalty.
Fact10: It is not the case that company beta contests the penalty.
Fact11: Company beta does not reform its practices.
Fact12: Company beta does not implement new protocols.
Fact13: Company beta does not hire a DPO.
Fact14: It is not the case that company beta declares bankruptcy.

question: Device alpha complies with the GDPR.
